ow me where Chris has said you "only">get false communication or bad guys. =
> BTW I thought we were trying toget the negativity behind us and move> on =
to constructive discussion.Guess that's more of the wishy-washy> depends on=
 what my hair feelslike doing ways here. from his own blog (clipped, but no=
t otherwisealtered):"Wednesday, November 28, 2007The Box has hit the fan!Cu=
rrentmood: distressed"I have recentlybeen made aware that there are several=
replica versions of thisdevice being sold. I have also been told ofanother =
device that canbe purchased for very little from anyelectronics merchant an=
daltered by hand, producing what some considerto be results. As Iexpected, =
the samples that people have sent me are*nothing morethan timed radio scans=
 that have no validity.* [emphasismine]"These new "radio scanners" are not =
only *a waste of money*forpeople looking to do research with them in hopes =
of havingeffectivecommunication with the other side, but may in fact be *ve=
rydangerous*.Should demonic and other negative entities learn to usethesefa=
lsedevices, *the results could be devastating.*"...The CatholicChurch ... p=
redicted the widespread sale of*false communicationdevices* as far back as =
last year. *I have recentlybegun to receiverequests from individuals asking=
 for help to closenegative doorwaysand portals that they believe they opene=
d usingtheir purchasedTelephone to the Dead replica*. Others are claiming> =
that I am a fraudbecause their purchased device doesn't producethe positive=
 results Ihave been fortunate enough to have."So let's go throug thisagain:=
*nothing more than timed radio scans that have no validity.**awaste of mone=
y**very dangerous**the results could bedevastating.**false communication de=
vices**I have recently begun toreceive requests from individuals asking for=
help to close negativedoorways and portals that they believe theyopened usi=
ng theirpurchased Telephone to the Dead replica.*As you see, there are twos=
tatements that Chris is making--so much forhe's always consistant,which I b=
elieve was an earlier statement thatyou made.1. The new boxescreate acciden=
tal timed radio scans only.2. The new boxes are verydangerous because they =
draw negative results.I'm not sure how the twostatements can stand together=
, but in eithercase, his opinion isclearly not complimentary toward the res=
t of thebox users besides thefour of the 30 he says, in the same post, "hav=
ebeen identified."Rathercheeky and insulting and wrong, HMO. But if he just=
 goes ondoingsessions like the one APSR recorded, I will continue to laud t=
hem.Ann > > > > > > > _____________________________________________________=
